texts.text: v0.7.1 alpha was a minor update to Minecraft: Pocket Edition that was released on June 7, 2013 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in v0.7.0.
The logo appears to have an updated look on the title screen.

24 issues fixed
From released versions before 0.7.0

MCPE-38 – Adding to furnace does not decrement inventory
MCPE-311 – Top of grass blocks are dark green, while sides are bright green.
MCPE-1241 – Incorrect quartz texture in hand
MCPE-1489 – Odd text screen
MCPE-1744 – Crash: "invalid surface"
MCPE-2062 – Incorrect Textures when holding in hand the Mossy Stone, Cracked Stone and Brick Stone
MCPE-2121 – Device completely freezes when placing a sign
MCPE-2407 – game crash when signs destroyed
MCPE-3140 – Fire wont stay working on netherrack, it goes off

MCPE-2453 – Furnace broke
MCPE-2458 – Messed up fire animation
MCPE-2461 – Eating animation missing
MCPE-2541 – Armor cannot be removed
MCPE-2586 – GUI Bug on Play Menu
MCPE-2731 – Trying to login to Realms takes me to Mojang.com
MCPE-2751 – Cannot create a realms world and cant connect to a local server.
MCPE-2757 – Creating Realm Server Fails without Error Message.
MCPE-2946 – GUI on sub-6-inch 1080p phones.
MCPE-3068 – Unstackable buckets
MCPE-3844 – Typing "new" leads to the last joined world

Cows can be milked in creative, but an empty bucket will not appear.
Fixed losing milk buckets when crafting cake.
Fixed not being able to obtain water with buckets in split-touch controls.
Fixed opening another available world when creating a new world while scrolling.
